Description: Funerary papyrus of Djedher Paian; sheet 1; Hieratic text.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt), Tomb of Ankhhor (TT 414) (See Gill 2019b for further references on provenance and date)
Curator's comments: To be published by F. Herbin, Late Religious Texts. 2 The glorifications are published in J. Assmann et al. Altaegyptische Totenliturgien III Osirisliturgien in Papyri derSpaetzeit (Heidelberg 2008).
Szczudlowska, ZAS 98 (1970): pl.11 (note upper image shows present state of papyrus; lower image includes virtually re-arranged fragments)
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (54)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57047) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57047)
Gill 2019b / The funerary papyri of the brothers Djedher and Pakherkhonsu in the Museo Egizio and the British Museum with some observations on scribal practices
